item.title: A Critic Takes the White House Tour
item.description: It’s the time when the White House is the People’s House and history is most palpable, thanks to Mrs. Kennedy. But, alas, the tours are now canceled t...

item.title: Small Business Needs Permanent Regulatory Relief, Too
item.description: Congress and President Trump must act quickly to give 32 million small businesses permanent relief from a painful and pointless government mandate.

item.title: Karen Wright, Fierce Friend of Liberty and, Above All Else, Mother. R.I.P.
item.description: Remembering one of the more consequential conservative Americans of our lifetime.

item.title: Tomahawk Missiles for Ukraine Should Be on the Table
item.description: A lesson of the Gaza deal is that the beginning of diplomatic wisdom is backing our ally to the hilt.

item.title: The Supreme Court Can Choose to Clarify Election Laws in Advance
item.description: Candidates for office should be able to sue in advance to find out when the election is.
